code: var axios=require('axios');var signup=function signup(email,firstName,lastName,company,password){return axios.post('/api/auth/signup',{email:email,firstName:firstName,lastName:lastName,company:company,password:password}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){return err.response.data;});};var login=function login(email,password){console.log('email'+email);return axios.post('/api/auth/login',{email:email,password:password}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){return err.response.data;});};var logout=function logout(){return axios.delete('/api/auth/logout').then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){return err.response.data;});};export{signup,logout,login};
